item.title: CVE-2023-6768|2024-09-16T18:26:36.763Z -- amazing%20little%20poll -- amazing%20little%20poll
item.description: Authentication bypass vulnerability in Amazing Little Poll affecting versions 1.3 and 1.4. This vulnerability could allow an unauthenticated user to access the admin panel without providing any credentials by simply accessing the "lp_admin.php?adminstep=" parameter.
